name: Push 'em Together
description:
Push 'em Together - By Ahmed Hamdi

A game where you have to push strong objects to the finish line with the help of your teammates before time runs out. You and the strong object that you are pushing should enter the finish line in order to be successful. You need every teammate in order to push the strong objects due to the greater amount of forces applied.

  • The player is indicated by the green arrow.
  • The teammates are indicated by the blue arrow.
  • The strong object in the levels is indicated by the red arrow.

The arrows can be seen at the top of the player, teammates and the strong object.

Controls Move left
Left Arrow
AMove right
Right Arrow
DJump
Spacebar
